description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院前总理温家宝之子，中国商人和企业家，曾创立优创科技有限公司和新天域资本公司，并曾担任中国卫星通信集团董事长。
description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，是温云松的父亲。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He is the father of Wen Yunsong.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝的夫人，温云松之母。中国珠宝玉石专家，曾任中国珠宝协会副主席、国家珠宝玉石质量监督检验中心主任等职。
description.en: Wife of Wen Jiabao and mother of Wen Yunsong. She is a Chinese jewelry and jade expert, and has served as vice chairman of the Gems & Jewelry Trade Association of China and director of the National Gemstone Testing Center.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝与张培莉之女，温云松之妹。曾在雷曼兄弟公司和瑞士信贷第一波士顿银行任职。
description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.zh-cn: 温如春的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Wen Ruchun.

en: Premier of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的负责人，是中华人民共和国中央人民政府的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who is the highest leader of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的大学，温云松在此获得工科学位。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, where Wen Yunsong obtained his engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 位于加拿大安大略省温莎市的大学，温云松在此获得材料科学硕士学位。
description.en: A university in Windsor, Ontario, Canada, where Wen Yunsong obtained his master's degree in materials science.

description.zh-cn: 美国西北大学的商学院，温云松在此获得工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: The business school of Northwestern University in the United States, where Wen Yunsong obtained his MBA.

nodes.id: 西北大学 (美国伊利诺州)

zh-cn: 西北大学 (美国伊利诺州)

description.zh-cn: 位于美国伊利诺伊州的私立研究型大学，凯洛管理学院是其下属学院。
description.en: A private research university in Illinois, United States, of which the Kellogg School of Management is a constituent school.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国投资银行与金融服务公司，曾因温云松身份敏感而拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: An American multinational investment bank and financial services company that once rejected Wen Yunsong's job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 由温云松在北京创立的公司，为银行、证券公司提供网络建设服务。
description.en: A company founded by Wen Yunsong in Beijing that provides network construction services for banks and securities firms.

description.zh-cn: 美国电脑科技公司，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: An American computer technology company that was a partner of Unihub.

description.zh-cn: 已解散的加拿大电信设备制造商，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: A defunct Canadian telecommunications equipment manufacturer that was a partner of Unihub.

description.zh-cn: 美国科技公司，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: An American technology company that was a partner of Unihub.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人和企业家，其公司电讯盈科曾投资温云松创立的中盈优创。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and entrepreneur whose company, PCCW, invested in Unihub, founded by Wen Yunsong.

description.zh-cn: 香港的电信公司，曾投资温云松创立的中盈优创。
description.en: A Hong Kong-based telecommunications company that invested in Unihub, founded by Wen Yunsong.

description.zh-cn: 中国电信运营商，曾与电讯盈科成立合资公司。
description.en: A Chinese telecommunications operator that formed a joint venture with PCCW.

description.zh-cn: 由温云松等人于2005年合作创办的私募基金公司。
description.en: A private equity firm co-founded by Wen Yunsong and others in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 由温云松担任创始合伙人的创投基金。
description.en: A venture capital fund where Wen Yunsong is a founding partner.

zh-cn: 中国卫星通信集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国航天科技集团下属公司，温云松曾先后担任其副董事长和董事长。
description.en: A subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation, where Wen Yunsong successively served as vice chairman and chairman.

nodes.id: 联动优势科技有限公司

zh-cn: 联动优势科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 经营无线增值业务的公司，由北京博升、中移动、银联商务于2003年共同创建，温云松曾被任命为董事。
description.en: A company engaged in wireless value-added services, jointly established in 2003 by Beijing Bestsure, China Mobile, and China UMS. Wen Yunsong was appointed as a director.

nodes.id: 北京博升优势科技发展有限公司

zh-cn: 北京博升优势科技发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2000年创建的公司，是联动优势科技有限公司的股东之一，郑建源是其主要投资人。
description.en: A company founded in 2000, one of the shareholders of UMPay. Zheng Jianyuan was its main investor.

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信运营商，联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。
description.en: A Chinese mobile communications operator and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay.

description.zh-cn: 中国的第三方支付公司，联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。
description.en: A third-party payment company in China and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay.

description.zh-cn: 背景神秘的商人，曾因持有大量平安保险股份而登上富豪榜。有媒体暗示其为温云松的代理人。
description.en: A mysterious businessman who once appeared on the rich list for holding a large number of shares in Ping An Insurance. Some media have suggested he is a proxy for Wen Yunsong.

description.zh-cn: 独立的国际组织，总部设在瑞士日内瓦。温云松曾在2009年作为全球青年领袖代表参加其夏季达沃斯论坛。
description.en: An independent international organization headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland. Wen Yunsong attended its Summer Davos Forum in 2009 as a representative of the Young Global Leaders.

description.zh-cn: 英国的国际性金融报纸，曾报道温云松及其私募基金新天域资本公司。
description.en: An international financial newspaper based in the UK that has reported on Wen Yunsong and his private equity firm, New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 日本企业家，软体银行的创始人与首席执行官。其公司是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: A Japanese entrepreneur, founder and CEO of SoftBank. His company is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 由孙正义领导的日本跨国企业集团，是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: A Japanese multinational conglomerate led by Masayoshi Son, which is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡总理李显龙的夫人，曾主掌淡马锡控股。淡马锡是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: Wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, who formerly headed Temasek Holdings. Temasek is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治人物，曾任新加坡总理，是何晶的丈夫。
description.en: A Singaporean politician who served as the Prime Minister of Singapore, and is the husband of Ho Ching.

description.zh-cn: 由何晶曾主掌的新加坡国有控股公司，是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: A Singaporean state-owned holding company formerly headed by Ho Ching, which is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

en: China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation

description.zh-cn: 中国国有特大型高科技企业集团，是中国卫星通信集团的母公司。
description.en: A state-owned mega high-tech enterprise group in China, and the parent company of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 中国综合金融服务集团，郑建源曾通过其控股公司持有该公司大量股份。
description.en: A Chinese integrated financial services group, in which Zheng Jianyuan once held a large number of shares through his holding companies.

description.zh-cn: 由郑建源代表的控股公司之一，曾持有平安保险股份。
description.en: One of the holding companies represented by Zheng Jianyuan, which once held shares in Ping An Insurance.

description.zh-cn: 由郑建源代表的控股公司之一，曾持有平安保险股份。
description.en: One of the holding companies represented by Zheng Jianyuan, which once held shares in Ping An Insurance.

description.zh-cn: 中国财经类日报，曾调查郑建源背景并暗示其与温云松的关系。
description.en: A Chinese financial daily newspaper that investigated Zheng Jianyuan's background and hinted at his relationship with Wen Yunsong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内的一个非正式派系，据博讯新闻称，其与温家宝存在权力斗争。
description.en: An informal faction within the Chinese Communist Party, which, according to Boxun News, was engaged in a power struggle with Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体，曾报道电讯盈科投资中盈优创可能违反外资持股规定。
description.en: A Chinese media outlet that reported PCCW's investment in Unihub might have violated foreign ownership regulations.

description.zh-cn: 新天域资本曾投资的公司。
description.en: A company in which New Horizon Capital had invested.

description.zh-cn: 中国的珠宝行业协会，温云松之母张培莉曾任副主席。
description.en: A jewelry industry association in China, where Wen Yunsong's mother, Zhang Peili, served as vice chairman.

description.zh-cn: 已倒闭的美国投资银行，温云松之妹温如春曾在此任职。
description.en: A defunct American investment bank where Wen Yunsong's sister, Wen Ruchun, once worked.

description.zh-cn: 瑞士信贷集团的投资银行部门，温云松之妹温如春曾在此任职。
description.en: The investment banking division of Credit Suisse Group, where Wen Yunsong's sister, Wen Ruchun, once worked.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府对其互联网边界审查系统的统称，导致“温云松”等词成为网络搜索的敏感词。
description.en: The common term for the Internet censorship system of the Chinese government, which has made terms like 'Wen Yunsong' sensitive for web searches.

description.zh-cn: 中国科技公司，其搜索引擎曾将“温云松”设为敏感词并限制搜索结果。
description.en: A Chinese technology company whose search engine once designated 'Wen Yunsong' as a sensitive term and restricted search results.

description.zh-cn: 中国科技公司，其搜索引擎对“温云松”的搜索结果有限。
description.en: A Chinese technology company whose search engine provided limited results for 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 中国的微博客网站，曾完全封锁与“温云松”相关的微博。
description.en: A Chinese microblogging website that once completely blocked posts related to 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温家宝的儿子。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the son of Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是张培莉的儿子。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the son of Zhang Peili.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温如春的哥哥。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the brother of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 张培莉是温家宝的夫人。
description.en: Zhang Peili is the wife of Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 刘春航是温如春的丈夫。
description.en: Liu Chunhang is the husband of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Wen Jiabao served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 西北大学 (美国伊利诺州)

description.zh-cn: 凯洛管理学院是西北大学的商学院。
description.en: The Kellogg School of Management is the business school of Northwestern University.

description.zh-cn: 因温云松身份敏感为由，拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: Rejected his job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 温云松在北京创立了优创科技有限公司（中盈优创）。
description.en: Wen Yunsong founded Unihub Global Network (Zhongying Youchuang) in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中盈优创与戴尔有合作关系。
description.en: Unihub had a partnership with Dell.

description.zh-cn: 中盈优创与北电网络有合作关系。
description.en: Unihub had a partnership with Nortel Networks.

description.zh-cn: 中盈优创与思科有合作关系。
description.en: Unihub had a partnership with Cisco.

description.zh-cn: 李泽楷的电讯盈科投资中盈优创，持股达七成以上。
description.en: Richard Li's PCCW invested in Unihub, holding over 70% of its shares.

description.zh-cn: 电讯盈科与中国电信成立合资公司，中盈优创后并入该公司。
description.en: PCCW and China Telecom formed a joint venture, into which Unihub was later incorporated.

description.zh-cn: 温云松于2010年10月转任中国卫星通信集团副董事长，并于2012年2月15日升任董事长。
description.en: Wen Yunsong was appointed Vice Chairman of China Satcom in October 2010, and was promoted to Chairman on February 15, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国卫星通信集团是中国航天科技集团下属公司。
description.en: China Satcom is a subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.

relationships.source: 北京博升优势科技发展有限公司
relationships.target: 联动优势科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2003年，北京博升与中移动、银联商务共同创建联动优势科技有限公司。
description.en: In 2003, Beijing Bestsure, along with China Mobile and China UMS, co-founded UMPay.

relationships.target: 联动优势科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2003年，中移动与北京博升、银联商务共同创建联动优势科技有限公司。
description.en: In 2003, China Mobile, along with Beijing Bestsure and China UMS, co-founded UMPay.

relationships.target: 联动优势科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2003年，银联商务与北京博升、中移动共同创建联动优势科技有限公司。
description.en: In 2003, China UMS, along with Beijing Bestsure and China Mobile, co-founded UMPay.

relationships.target: 联动优势科技有限公司
北京博升优势科技发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 郑建源是创建于2000年的北京博升优势科技发展有限公司的主要投资人，拥有其全部股份的50%。
description.en: Zheng Jianyuan was the main investor in Beijing Bestsure, founded in 2000, owning 50% of its total shares.

description.zh-cn: 软体银行是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: SoftBank is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 淡马锡控股是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: Temasek Holdings is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 孙正义是软体银行的创始人和首席执行官。
description.en: Masayoshi Son is the founder and CEO of SoftBank.

description.zh-cn: 何晶曾主掌淡马锡控股。
description.en: Ho Ching formerly headed Temasek Holdings.

description.zh-cn: 何晶是新加坡总理李显龙的夫人。
description.en: Ho Ching is the wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 据《21世纪经济报道》等媒体暗示，郑建源可能是温云松的代理人，为其代持股份。
description.en: According to media outlets like the '21st Century Business Herald', it is suggested that Zheng Jianyuan may be a proxy for Wen Yunsong, holding shares on his behalf.

description.zh-cn: 据博讯新闻称，媒体对温云松的负面报道与当时温家宝和江泽民派系（上海帮）的政治权力斗争有关。
description.en: According to Boxun News, negative media reports about Wen Yunsong were related to the political power struggle between Wen Jiabao and the Jiang Zemin faction (Shanghai clique) at the time.

description.zh-cn: 于2010年3月发表报道，批评包括温云松在内的中共太子党竞相参与私募基金以获取暴利。
description.en: Published a report in March 2010 criticizing CCP princelings, including Wen Yunsong, for flocking to private equity to make huge profits.

description.zh-cn: 新天域资本投资新世纪百货，获利丰厚。
description.en: New Horizon Capital invested in New Century Department Store and made substantial profits.

description.zh-cn: 由于防火长城的审查机制，“温云松”成为网络搜索敏感词，导致其信息在百度、搜狗、新浪微博等平台被封锁或限制。
description.en: Due to the Great Firewall's censorship mechanism, 'Wen Yunsong' became a sensitive search term, leading to the blocking or restriction of his information on platforms like Baidu, Sogou, and Sina Weibo.
